title: Kenneth Cole Reaction Shadow Floral Bedding Collection at Bed Bath & Beyond
description: Dress your bed in the Kenneth Cole Reaction Home Shadow Floral Comforter for a chic look in your bedroom. With an all-over aqua floral print on a dusty grey background, the plush bedding brings a subtle feminine and modern touch to any room. Thanks for watching.

asset.author: Bed Bath & Beyond
asset.hookText:
http://www.bedbathandbeyond.com/store/product/kenneth-cole-reaction-home-shadow-floral-comforter-set/211195?Keyword=shadow+floral&view=list
Dress your bed in the Kenneth Cole Reaction Home Shadow Floral Comforter for a chic look in your bedroom. With an all-over aqua floral print on a dusty grey background, the plush bedding brings a subtle feminine and modern touch to any room. Thanks for watching. Make sure to subscribe to the Bed Bath & Beyond YouTube Channel.

transcripts: The Shadow floral comforter and bedding collection by Kenneth Cole reaction home was designed exclusively for Bed Bath and Beyond. The first layer of the bed begins with a euro shams. They add an ideal backdrop to the bed and are 100 percent linen in a cool aqua. The shadow floral comforter and pillow shams are a floral printed pattern in emerald and silvery gray tones. The coordinating pillow shams are finished with the same floral motif. The resulting bed is cool and modern the decorative pillows accenting this beds suites are a square solid velvet pillow in emerald, a metallic square pillow with an intricate lace like embroidery in tones of gray, and a white channel stitch pillow with silver metallic thread. The pillows add the key fashion elements to complete this bed look. The shadow floral comforter bedding collection is part of the Kenneth Cole reaction home collection is available exclusively online and at select Bed Bath and Beyond stores.
